name: Messi Business
description:
You are playing as Messi and your goal is to pass the ball to offshore for your accountant to take care of. Unfortunately, tax authorities are trying to intercept your money transfer and if they do, you will have to pay all taxes on your earnings AND do social work!

This time we had a lot of fun and interaction with our viewers on Twitch, so we spent more than 3 hours on the game.
